bill.summary:
Corporate Political Disclosure Act of 2018
This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require issuers, on an annual basis, to publicly disclose political activity expenditures made during the previous year. The Securities and Exchange Commission must issue regulations to carry out this bill.
